name: dfs.namenode.replication.max-streams
description: Hard limit for the number of replication streams other than those with highest-priority.

name: ipc.[port_number].weighted-cost.lockexclusive
description:
The weight multiplier to apply to the time spent in the
    processing phase which holds an exclusive (write) lock.
    This property applies to WeightedTimeCostProvider.

name: fs.s3a.socket.send.buffer
description: Socket send buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-reset-time-period-ms
description:
The time period in milliseconds that the allocation count for each array length is
    reset to zero if there is no increment.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.plan.threshold.percent
description:
The percentage threshold value for volume Data Density in a plan.
      If the absolute value of volume Data Density which is out of
      threshold value in a node, it means that the volumes corresponding to
      the disks should do the balancing in the plan. The default value is 10.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruct.read.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the EC reconstruction can utilize for reading.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.max.connections
description:
Max allowed connections for the shuffle.  Set to 0 (zero)
               to indicate no limit on the number of connections.

name: dfs.batched.ls.limit
description:
Limit the number of paths that can be listed in a single batched
    listing call. printed by ls. If less or equal to
    zero, at most DFS_LIST_LIMIT_DEFAULT (= 1000) will be printed.
